title: Help Me get my account back v2
body: A few months ago when the open beta first came out for the new client i thought hey that pretty cool and tried it out. It was pretty good but then i got a new computer and tried to log onto my level thirty account instead of the one i had made for the open beta. however when i tried to do so i could only get into the beta account has anyone else had this problem as i had spent money on the old account and have spent money on the new one. So can anybody help

replies.body: You'll need to make sure that you're using the NA region on the client if this is the account you're trying to login to, as well as using the username associated with your Live account. If you're still having problems, feel free to hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
